sunlight: Full sun only if soil kept moist
description: Boxwood (Buxus sempervirens 'Flora Place') is an amazing plant species. It is renowned for its dark green foliage and its ability to thrive in both sun and shade. Its dense, mounded form is a great choice when creating structure and depth in the garden. Its evergreen foliage also provides a pretty backdrop for colorful rose or petunia blossoms in the spring or summer months. Its slow growth rate and drought-tolerance makes it really easy to maintain, and pruning it into a desired shape is simple as well. Overall, boxwood is a great choice for creating a stunning landscape feature.
